statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.text) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.uid , AA.text , AA.category_uid , AA.sex
, AA.RequestID , BB.Status , BB.RequestDate
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsSize AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsRequest BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.RequestID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.RequestID = #RequestID#
AND AA.category_uid = #CategoryUid#
AND AA.sex = #Gender#
AND ( AA.text LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsSize AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsSize AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.uid = #uid#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TSmapsSize ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, RequestID, uid, text, category_uid, sex ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #RequestID#, #uid#, #text#, #category_uid#, #sex# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsSize SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, RequestID = #RequestID# , uid = #uid# , text = #text# , category_uid = #category_uid# , sex = #sex# WHERE ID = #ID#
